attributes.action: Pay compensation for speed (safety) camera detectors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a matter of common law the Government is obliged to pay reasonable compensation for property previously legally owned and subsequently made illegal (see handgun legislation)
Before the new law comes into force making safety camera detectors illegal the Government must arrange a valuation system for existing detectors and provision for handing in these detectors in return for a compensation payment.
This will have the effect of compensating the owner for the loss of his legal property and removing the said detectors from possible continued use.
